Html:
Suppose I have 2 camera. I start with one , switch over to the other and then toggle back.
Error at  if (value.NativeInterface == null){ throw new InvalidComObjectException("The camera has been disposed");}

This would be a nice feature to have,perhaps        

 

 -----------------

I guess it's a problem with how the demo app, releases camera handles on selection change

Hi Rajiv,
This bug was fixed in our upgrade to a managed C++ WebCamLib (change 25620).
Feel free to grab the latest version from our source code repository (we have binaries there too).
Thanks for pointing it out!
- Mike
